:show.description: Whether to display a pop-up window

overlay.description: Whether or not to display a mask

duration.description: The time of the animation transition when the mask is open or collapsed, in ms
duration.description_zh: 遮罩打开或收起的动画过渡时间，单位ms

closeable.description: Whether or not to display the close icon

overlayStyle.description: Mask custom style, generally used to modify the mask color, e.g.: {background: 'rgba(3, 100, 219, 0.5)'}
overlayStyle.description_zh: 遮罩自定义样式，一般用于修改遮罩颜色，如：{background: 'rgba(3, 100, 219, 0.5)'}

overlayOpacity.description: Mask transparency, between 0 and 1, do not share with overlayStyle
overlayOpacity.description_zh: 遮罩透明度，0-1之间，勿与overlayStyle共用

closeOnClickOverlay.description: Click on whether the mask closes the pop-up window (Note: The closing event needs to be handled by yourself, and you will only click on the mask layer to execute the close callback after closing OnClickOverlay)
closeOnClickOverlay.description_zh: 点击遮罩是否关闭弹窗（注意：关闭事件需要自行处理，只会在开启closeOnClickOverlay后点击遮罩层执行close回调）

zIndex.description: The z-index value of the pop-up layer

safeAreaInsetBottom.description: Whether or not to leave a safe distance from the bottom
safeAreaInsetBottom.description_zh: 是否为留出底部安全距离

safeAreaInsetTop.description: Whether to leave a safe distance from the top (status bar height)
safeAreaInsetTop.description_zh: 是否留出顶部安全距离（状态栏高度）

closeIconPos.description: Customize the position of the close icon, top-left is the upper left corner, top-right is the upper right corner, bottom-left is the lower left corner, and bottom-right is the lower right corner
closeIconPos.description_zh: 自定义关闭图标位置，top-left为左上角，top-right为右上角，bottom-left为左下角，bottom-right为右下角

round.description: 设置圆角值，仅对mode = top | bottom | center有效
round.description_zh: 设置圆角值，仅对mode = top | bottom | center有效

zoom.description: When mode=center, whether to enable scaling
zoom.description_zh: 当mode=center时 是否开启缩放

bgColor.description: The background color, generally used in special pop-up content scenarios, can be set to transparent to remove the default white background
bgColor.description_zh: 背景色，一般用于特殊弹窗内容场景，设置为transparent可去除默认的白色背景
